name: Robo Wizard: and the Gear of Destiny
name_original: Robo Wizard: and the Gear of Destiny
description:
For the Experis Game Jam.

You are a Robot Wizard that must find all key items and unlock the door to exit!

Controls Mouse and Keyboard:

A-Left
D-Right
L Shift-Dash/Air Dash
Space- Jump
LMB - Fire
